ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
Welcome back, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’ve been hoping that you would visit again!
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Let’s share a lot of feelings today and let our
hearts shine beautifully!
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8201_2101_01_10: If you’d like, try using this!
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8201_2101_02_10: It’s best to share when you find something nice!
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
I thought this would suit your taste,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
Do you like it? Then maybe I should give you
more gifts!
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
This is a present for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
You always fill me with the energy I need to
keep facing new challenges!
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
So this is to return the favor! Always keep on
shining!
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
I want you to tell me more about yourself, 
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
I can’t wait to hear what you want to talk about
today, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Thank you! This makes me so happy!
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8201_2301_01_10: Thank you! This is such a lovely present!
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
This is overflowing with the warm feelings that fill
your heart... I’ll treasure it!
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8201_2402_01_10: Well then, let’s talk again sometime. That was fun!
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8201_2401_01_10: Thank you! I had a wonderful time.
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
Talking with you fills me with joy! Come chat with
me again anytime!
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
The Trainer Lodge is a space where you can
take a breather.
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
If you share your warm feelings and positive
thoughts for the future with everyone over a
cup of coffee...
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8001_0701_03_10: You’re sure to have a happy life!
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
Auditioning for roles is tough, but it can be
fun, too.
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
Each time you take on a new role, it widens your 
range as an actor.
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
Newcomers with shining talent keep popping up,
so I have to step up my game!
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
Acting isn’t just for actors. It’s something everyone
does subconsciously.
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
There are times in everyday life when you adjust
your tone or attitude to match who you’re talking
with, right? That’s acting!
ch0158_00_carnet_salon/8003_0701_03_10: We may all just be actors on this stage called life.
